channel.title: [PI] Stuck on clickingbuttons.java

item.title: [PI] Stuck on clickingbuttons.java
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:1, topic:374690”]Okay, so i have everything integrated and such, all i need now is make it so that when i click KDR on my quest tab it will show me my KDR.

heres what i have:

case 28215://5 KDR double KDR = ((double)c.KC)/((double)c.DC); c.forcedChat("My Kill/Death ratio is "+c.KC+"/"+c.DC+"; "+KDR+"."); break;

and the error i get:

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:120: cannot find symbol symbol : method forcedChat(java.lang.String) location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant c.forcedChat("My Kill/Death ratio is "+c.KC+"/"+c.DC+"; "+KDR+"."); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

My command for KDR:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("kdr")) { double KDR = ((double)c.KC)/((double)c.DC); c.forcedChat("My Kill/Death ratio is "+c.KC+"/"+c.DC+"; "+KDR+"."); }

If anyone knows the method to making it use the command
i would appreciate it alot! ++[/quote]
Isn’t it c.forceChat and not c.forcedChat?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Stuck on clickingbuttons.java
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Okay, so i have everything integrated and such, all i need now is make it so that when i click KDR on my quest tab it will show me my KDR.

heres what i have:

case 28215://5 KDR double KDR = ((double)c.KC)/((double)c.DC); c.forcedChat("My Kill/Death ratio is "+c.KC+"/"+c.DC+"; "+KDR+"."); break;

and the error i get:

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:120: cannot find symbol symbol : method forcedChat(java.lang.String) location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant c.forcedChat("My Kill/Death ratio is "+c.KC+"/"+c.DC+"; "+KDR+"."); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

My command for KDR:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("kdr")) { double KDR = ((double)c.KC)/((double)c.DC); c.forcedChat("My Kill/Death ratio is "+c.KC+"/"+c.DC+"; "+KDR+"."); }

If anyone knows the method to making it use the command
i would appreciate it alot! ++
